data.title: Darshana Apartment Sonar Pada, Dombivli East - Without Brokerage Fully furnished 1 BHK Flat for Sale in Darshana Apartment, Mumbai for Rs. 2,100,000 | NoBroker
meta_keywords: 1 BHK flat for sale in Darshana Apartment
house for sale in Darshana Apartment
property for sale in Sonar Pada
data.meta_description: Get WITHOUT BROKERAGE Fully furnished 1 BHK flat for Sale in Darshana Apartment, Sonar Pada, Dombivli East, Mumbai . Contact Owners Directly. #NoBroker
data.text:
1) located in sonarpada dombivli east (Proposed metro station) 2) property is grampanchayat approved *********** 3) now the property is under kdmc. 4) flat wise kdmc property tax receipt available with all dues cleared till date. 5) 4th floor - Total 5 floor 6) 4 km from dombivli railway station 7) 1 km from kalyan-Shil highway 8) fully furnished room 9) build-Up area - 530 sqft 10) carpet area - 345 sqft 11) 3 feet galary in hall. 12) safety door, grills on all windows 13) led lights available in hall, bedroom, kitchen, gallary, toilet, bathroom 14) kitchen trolley with attached box on wall 15) 700 ltr water tank 16) pop in hall and bedroom 17) attractive entrance 18) lift available and parking available for two wheelers. 19) flat cost 21 lakhs + government charges extra. 20) drinking water 30 minutes in the morning. (7am to 7.30am) 21) borewell water 15-20 minutes in the morning. 22) maintenance - 500/- A one bedroom in Sonar Pada, Dombivli East for sale is now available, it is one of a few houses at this rate. Situated on the 4th floor this home can comfortably serve your parking lot for a bike needs. This East facing home is over 530 sqft. & is in a convenient location. With premium amenities such as servant quarters & house keeping this home provides you with many added benefits. If you are looking for a home with elevator, this home is just right for you. Being situated near ICON HOSPITAL PVT. LTD., SRV Mamata Hospital and Divyajyot Eye Care, emergency care is very easily available at any time. With New Sunrise English High School, TilakNagar Vidya Mandir School and PODAR INTERNATIONAL SCHOOL close to this home, you'll be able to provide your children with many options to choose from. With a petrol pump & super market your daily needs are easily fulfilled With Shopping Mall, Madhuban Cinema & Bhausaheb Tirodkar Sabhagruha close by, you can catch your favourite movies running & never worry about missing a show because of traffic. Never miss out on lifestyle as PP Chambers, Designtech Shopping and City Mall are so close by.
